entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:48 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Mountain 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
Temperature: -7.7°C
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: -8.6°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow or rain. High 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning then changing to rain this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 90 except gusting to 140 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence this afternoon. High 12. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then cloudy with showers beginning after midnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 except gusting to 140 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 this evening then west 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023
